metadata.name: Food Hunt
metadata.description:
He roams the streets in search of food; he encapsulates the current situation in Nigeria and many other countries: hunger, insecurity, and despair.

By buying this piece, you're not only collecting an NFT but also providing food and other basic necessities to some kids and families in urgent need as a significant portion of the proceeds would be used to support NGOs that cater to internally displaced persons in northern Nigeria.

Dimension:
3264 x 4928 Pixels
